Those who expect Mike Pence , R-Columbus, to run for governor may have been heartened by his statement to lawmakers that the states hold the promise of the future. Those who are pushing him instead to run for the White House in 2012 may focus in on his call for a "new federalism"-- which sounded like a budding presidential slogan.
